name: Track Skipper Hero
description:
-Story-

DJ is a College music student. He was studying late one night when they fell asleep. DJ 'wakes up' in a strange musical dream world, now armed with his recorder pistol, he must shoot, run,  jump and survive in order to make sure he can wake up in time for class in the morning. 

Fight against musical instruments in this musical themed platformer.

-Controls-

Arrow Keys to move Left and Right

Up Arrow Key and Left Control Key to jump

Escape to quit game at any time

-About Music-

This game has no sound or audio.. that is where you come in. Pick a playlist or song and play the game with your own BGM.
